anya-e0813n:11: Nissāyevā tipemā paṇamiya sirasā niccamesaṃ saritvā,
anya-e0813n:24: Niccaṃ ye mettha bālā varahadayayutā suṭṭhu nikkhittanettā,
anya-e0813n:26: Gambhīraṃ duttaraṃ te jinavacanudadhiṃ tiṇṇathāmā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0813n:27: Laddhopāyā ca candaṃ taditarapacuraṃ sakkataṃ sotukāmā.
anya-e0813n:33: Tasmā ettha pamādādi – dosaleso bhave yadi;
anya-e0813n:44_0: Akkharāpi akārādayo ekacattālīsaṃ suttantopakārā. Taṃ yathā-a ā-i ī-u ū-e o, ka kha
anya-e0813n:44_1: ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma,
anya-e0813n:44_2: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ-iti.
anya-e0813n:46: Tattha akkharesu okārantā aṭṭha sarā nāma. Tattheti vattate.
anya-e0813n:48: Tattha saresu lahumattā a, i, u iti tayo rassā.
anya-e0813n:51: Saṃyogato pubbe eo rassā ivoccante, anantarā byañjanā saṃyogo. Ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0813n:53: Sare ṭhapetvā sesā kādayo niggahītantā byañjanā.
anya-e0813n:55: Byañjanānaṃ kādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā.
anya-e0813n:56_0: 8. Vaggānaṃ paṭhamadutiyā so cāghoso. Ḷantāññe ghosā. Ghosāghosasaññā ca “parasamaññā
anya-e0813n:56_1: payoge”ti saṅgahītā. Evaṃ liṅga, sabbanāma, pada, upasagga, nipāta, taddhita, ākhyāta,
anya-e0813n:58: Aṃiti akārato paraṃ yo bindu sūyate, taṃ niggahītaṃ nāma.
anya-e0813n:61: 10. A, kavagga, hā kaṇḍajā, i, cavagga, yā tālujā, u, pavaggā oṭṭhajā, ṭavagga, ra, ḷā muddhajā, tavagga, la, sā dantajā, e kaṇṭhatālujo, o kaṇṭhoṭṭhajo, vo dantoṭṭhajo.
anya-e0813n:64: 11. Loka aggoityasmiṃ – “pubbamadhoṭhita massaraṃ sarena viyojaye”ti pubbabyañjanaṃ sarato puthakkātabbaṃ.
anya-e0813n:66: Anantare sare pare sarā lopaṃ papponti.
anya-e0813n:67: “Nare paraṃ yutte”ti assaro byañjano parakkharaṃ netabbo lokaggo.
anya-e0813n:68: Saretyasmiṃ opasilesiko kāsasattamī, tato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne kāriyaṃ na hoti. Yathā-maṃ ahā sīti, “pamādamanuyuñjantī”tyādigāthāyaṃ ‘janā appamāda’nti ca. Evaṃ sabbasandhīsu.
anya-e0813n:69: Anantaraṃ parassa sarassa lopaṃ vakkhati, tasmānena pubbassa lopo ñāyati, teneva sattamīniddiṭṭhassa paratāpi gamyate.
anya-e0813n:70: 12. Saretyadhikāro. Pana ime pana imetīha-sarā lopaṃ itveva.
anya-e0813n:72: Asamānarūpāsaramhā paro saro vā lupyate, paname, panime.
anya-e0813n:75: Sare lutte parasarassa kvaci asavaṇṇo hotīti i u iccetesaṃ ṭhānāsannā e o. Bandhusseva. Nopeti.
anya-e0813n:76: 14. Tatra ayaṃ, yāni idha, bahu upakāraṃ, saddhā idha, tathā upamantyetasmiṃ –
anya-e0813n:78: Sare lutte paro saro kvaci ṭhānāsannaṃ dīghaṃ yāti. Tatrāyaṃ, yānīdha, bahūpakāraṃ, saddhīdha, tathūpamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:81: Sare lutte pubbo ca kvaci dīghaṃ yāti. Kiṃ sūdha.
anya-e0813n:84: Sare pare antassa ekārassa kvaci yo ādeso hoti, tyajja, “dīgha”nti byañjane pare kvaci dīgho, tyāhaṃ.
anya-e0813n:88: Sare pare anto kārukārānaṃ kvaci vo ādeso hoti. Svassa, anveti.
anya-e0813n:92: Sare pare dhassa kvaci do hoti. Dīghe – idāhaṃ. Kvacīti kiṃ. Idheva. Cakārena byañjanepi, idha bhikkhave.
anya-e0813n:95: Sare pare ivaṇṇassa yo navā hoti. Kata yakārassa tissa “sabbo cantī”ti kvaci cādese “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti sarato parabyañjanassa ṭhānāsannavasā dvittaṃ. Paccantaṃ, vutyassa.
anya-e0813n:97: Ettha “kvaci paṭi patisse”ti patissa paṭi, vaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ sabbattha rassadīgha saṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0813n:100: Sarato parassa evassādiekāro rittaṃ navā yāti. Pubbo ca ṭhānāsannaṃ rassaṃ. Yathariva. Yatheva.
anya-e0813n:101: 21. Na imassa, ti aṅgikaṃ, lahu essati, attha atthaṃ, ito āyati, tasmā iha, sabbhi eva, cha abhiññā, putha eva, pā evatīha vā tveva –
anya-e0813n:102: Ya va ma da na ta ra ḷā cāgamā.
anya-e0813n:103_0: Sare pare yādayo āgamā vā honti, cakārena go ca. Nayimassa, tivaṅgikaṃ, lahumessati,
anya-e0813n:103_1: attadatthaṃ, itonāyati, tasmātiha, sabbhireva, chaḷabhiñā, puthageva, “rassa”nti
anya-e0813n:104: Vāti kiṃ. Cha abhiññā, putha eva, pā eva.
anya-e0813n:105: Ettha “sare kvacī”ti sarānaṃ pakati hoti, sassarūpameva, na vikārotyattho.
anya-e0813n:110: 23. Byañjanetyadhikāro. Kvacītveva. So bhikkhu, kacci nu tvaṃ, jānema tantīha –
anya-e0813n:112: Byañjane pare sarānaṃ kvaci lopohoti, tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo, cakārena okārukārāpi. Sabhikkhu kaccino tvaṃ, jānemu taṃ.
anya-e0813n:116: Vagge ghosāghosānaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yutte ṭhāne, ugghoso, rasse akkhātaṃ.
anya-e0813n:117: 25. Para sahassaṃ, atippakhotīha – “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo. Parosahassaṃ. Gāgame ca, atippagokho.
anya-e0813n:118: 26. Ava naddhātyatra – “o avasse”ti kvaci avassa o. Onaddhā.
anya-e0813n:122: 27. Niggahītantyadhikāro. Kiṃ kato, saṃ jāto, saṃ ṭhito, taṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ mittantiha –
anya-e0813n:124: Vaggabyañjane pare bindussa tabbagganto vā hoti. Kiṅkato, sañjāto, saṇṭhito, tandhanaṃ, tammittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:129: Sare pare binduno ma dā vā honti. Evamassa, etadavoca.
anya-e0813n:133: Ekāre, he ca pare binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – taññeva, tameva. Tañhi, taṃ hi.
anya-e0813n:136: Yakāre pare tena saha binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – saññogo, saṃyogo.
anya-e0813n:137: 31. Cakkhu aniccaṃ, ava sirotīha - āgamo, kvacitveva.
anya-e0813n:139: Sare, byañjane vā pare kvaci bindvāgamo hoti. Cakkhuṃaniccaṃ, avaṃsiro.
anya-e0813n:146: Binduto paro saro vā lupyate, bījaṃva.
anya-e0813n:149: Binduto pare sare lutte saṃyogo byañjano vinaṭṭhasaṃyogo hotīti pubbasalopo. Evaṃsa.
anya-e0813n:153: Idhāniddiṭṭhā sandhayo vuttānusārena ñe yyā, yathā – yadi evaṃ, bodhi aṅgātīha – yādese iminā suttena dayakārasaṃyogassa jo, dhayakārasaṃyogassa jho, dvitte – yajjevaṃ, bojjhaṅgā.
anya-e0813n:155: Pari esanātīha – yādese rakārassa yo, payyesa nā.
anya-e0813n:157: Sarati, iti eva, sā itthī, busaṃ eva, bahu ābādho, adhi abhavi, sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ, jīvotīha –
anya-e0813n:158: Māgamo sakāre akārassa u ca, sumarati.
anya-e0813n:161: Mādese, pubbadīghe ca ekārassa i. Busāmiva.
anya-e0813n:164: Binduno, okārassa ca e. Sukhe, dukkhe, jīve.
anya-e0813n:166: 40. Sare, byañjane vā pare binduno kvaci mo. Mama abhāsi, buddhama saraṇaṃ, pubbe mo paraṃ na netabbo ayuttattā.
anya-e0813n:168: Taṃ iminā, evaṃ imaṃ, kiṃ ahaṃ tīha-issa a. Tadaminā.
anya-e0813n:169: Issa u, akārassa ca e, bindulopādo. Evumaṃ, kehaṃ.
anya-e0813n:172: 43. Alābūnityādo akāralopo. Lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti.
anya-e0813n:174: Akaramhase tetyādo sakāre garuno ekārassa iminā lahuakāro, akaramhasa te kiccaṃ.
anya-e0813n:176: Dīgho, saṃyogādipubbo rasso ca garu, lahu tu rasso. Yathā- ā, assa, aṃ, a.
anya-e0813n:185: Dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthayuttaṃ saddarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ nāma, jinavacanayoggaṃ liṅgaṃ idha ṭhapīyati nipphādīyati ca.
anya-e0813n:188: Tasmā liṅgā parā vibhattiyo honti. Cakārena tāsaṃ ekavacanādipaṭhamādisaññā ca.
anya-e0813n:189_0: “Si yo aṃ yo nā hi sa naṃ smā hi sa naṃ smiṃ sū” ti vibhattiyo. Si yo iti paṭhamā,
anya-e0813n:189_1: aṃ yo iti dutiyā, nā hi iti tatiyā, sa naṃ iti catutthī, smā hi iti pañcamī, sa naṃ
anya-e0813n:189_2: iti chaṭṭhī, smiṃ su iti sattamī.
anya-e0813n:191_0: Yo kammakattādivattantaramappatto sassarūpaṭṭho suddho, so liṅgattho nāma, tassābhidhānamatte
anya-e0813n:191_1: paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Tassāpaniyame ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṃ si, vuccate nenetivacanaṃ,
anya-e0813n:196: Aṃādīsu paresu sarassa lopo hoti, tasmiṃ kate tu kvacādinā asavaṇṇe patte pakati hoti.
anya-e0813n:197: Naye paraṃ yutte. Evamupari saralopādi. Buddho.
anya-e0813n:201: Akārantā paresaṃ paṭhamadutiyāyonīnaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ āe vā honti. Buddhā.
anya-e0813n:208: Ge pare akāro pitusatthuattarājādīnamanto ca āttaṃ yāti.
anya-e0813n:209: “Ākāro vā”ti ge pare ākārassa rasso vā.
anya-e0813n:211: So siṃ syā ca sakhāto gassevātyādiniddiṭṭhehaññe avaṇṇivaṇṇuvaṇṇokārantā sesā, tehi pare gasī lupyante. He - buddha, buddhā. Yo - buddhā.
anya-e0813n:213: Yaṃ karoti, taṃ kammaṃ nāma. Tattha dutiyā hoti. Aṃbuddhaṃ. Yossa e-buddhe.
anya-e0813n:216: Yo karoti, sa kattā nāma. Tattha tatiyā hoti. Nā.
anya-e0813n:218: Akārā paro nā enaṃ yāti. Buddhena.
anya-e0813n:223: Sabbasaddehi paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mhābhimhiiccete vā honti. Buddhebhi, buddhehi.
anya-e0813n:225: Yena vā kayirate, taṃ karaṇaṃ nāma. Tattha tatiyā hoti. Sabbaṃ kattusamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:227: Yassa dātukāmo rocate, dhārayate vā, taṃ sampadānaṃ nāma. Tattha catutthī hoti. Sa.
anya-e0813n:230: Akārā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyo vā hoti. Buddhāya.
anya-e0813n:234: Sunaṃhisu paresu sarādīnaṃ dīgho hoti. Casaddena kvaci na. Buddhānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:236: Yasmādapeti, bhayamādatte vā, tadapādānaṃ nāma, tattha pañcamī hoti. Smā.
anya-e0813n:239: Akārā paresaṃ smāsminnaṃ āe vā honti. Buddhā, buddhamhā, buddhasmā. Buddhebhi, buddhehi.
anya-e0813n:241: Yassa vā pariggaho, taṃ sāmī nāma. Tattha chaṭṭhī hoti. Buddhassa. Buddhānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:243: Yodhāro, tamokāsaṃ nāma. Tattha sattamī hoti. Smiṃ-buddhe, buddhamhi, buddhasmiṃ. Su-buddhesu.
anya-e0813n:245: Buddho buddha sukhaṃ dadāti sarato buddhaṃ tato dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0813n:246: Kiṃ buddhena mahiddhayopi munayo buddhena jātāsukhī;
anya-e0813n:247: Buddhasseva manaṃ dade padamahaṃ buddhā labheyyāccutaṃ,
anya-e0813n:248: Buddhassiddhi na kiṃ kare bhavabhave bhattyatthu buddhe mama.
anya-e0813n:249: 59. Ito paraṃ tatiyāpañcamīnañca catutthīchaṭṭhīnañca sarūpattā pañcamīchaṭṭhiyo bhīyo upekkhante.
anya-e0813n:256: 62. “Brahmattasakharājādito amāna”nti brahmādito aṃvacanassa ānaṃ vā hoti. Attānaṃ, attaṃ. Attāno.
anya-e0813n:258: “Attānto hismimanattaṃ”ti himhi attantassa ano. Attanehi. Evaṃ karaṇe.
anya-e0813n:261: Amhādito smā nā iva hoti. Attanā.
anya-e0813n:262: 66. “Tato sminnī”ti smino ni. Attani. “Anatta”nti bhāvaniddesena sumhi ca ano. Attanesu.
anya-e0813n:266: Nāmhi savibhattissa rājasaddassa raññā vā hoti. Raññā, rājena.
anya-e0813n:268: Sunaṃ hisu paresu rājassa rāju hoti, cakārena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n:269: “Sunaṃhisu ceti” dīghe - rājūbhi, rājūhi, rājebhi, rājehi.
anya-e0813n:271: “Rājassa rañño rājino se”ti se rañño rājino honti. Rañño, rājino.
anya-e0813n:272: “Raññaṃ namhi vā”ti namhi raññaṃ vā. Raññaṃ, rājūnaṃ, rājānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:273: 69. Smāssanātulyattā-nāmhi raññā vā. Raññā, rājamhā, rājasmā.
anya-e0813n:274: 70. “Smimhi raññe rājinī”ti smimhi raññe rājini honti. Raññe, rājini. Rājūsu, rājesu.
anya-e0813n:277: “Ā simhī”ti simhi savibhattissa ntussa ā. Guṇavā.
anya-e0813n:280: Paṭhame yomhi savibhattissa ntussa ntokāro hoti. Guṇavanto.
anya-e0813n:283: Sunaṃhisu, yosu, cakārena aññesupi paresu ntussanto attaṃ yāti. Guṇavantā.
anya-e0813n:286: Ge pare savibhattissa ntussa aṃaā honti. Heguṇavaṃ,guṇava, guṇavā. Yo - guṇavanto, guṇavantā.
anya-e0813n:288: 74. “Totitā sasmiṃ nāsvī”ti savibhattissa ntussa nāmhi tā, se tokāro, smimhi ti ca vā. Guṇavatā, guṇavantena. Guṇavantebhi, guṇavantehi.
anya-e0813n:290: “Namhi taṃ vā”ti namhi ntussa taṃ vā. Guṇavataṃ, guṇavantānaṃ. Smā nāva.
anya-e0813n:293: “Simhi gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo a”nti ntasaddassa aṃvā, silopo. Gacchaṃ, sissa o – gacchanto.
anya-e0813n:296: Vuttaṃ hitvā sesesu gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo ntu iva daṭṭhabbo. Gacchanto, gacchantāiccādi.
anya-e0813n:305: Kato nikāro lopo ca yesaṃ tesu yosu sarānaṃ dīgho hoti. Aggī. Pakkhe-attantveva.
anya-e0813n:307: Yosu akatarasso jho attaṃ yāti. Aggayo. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:309: Jhalapato aṃ mo ca binduṃ yanti. Aggiṃ. Aggī, aggayo.
anya-e0813n:311: 82. “Jhalato sassa no vā”ti sassa nottaṃ vā. Aggino, aggissa. Aggīnaṃ.
anya-e0813n:314: 85. Ādi aggīva. Smiṃno pana “ādito o ce”ti aṃ, o ca vā. Ādi, ādo, ādimhi, ādismiṃ. Ādīsu.
anya-e0813n:316: “Agho rassa”mādinā rasse sampatte “na sismimanapuṃsakānī”ti simhi anapuṃsakānaṃ na rasso. Silopo, daṇḍī, yolope – daṇḍī. Pakkhe –
anya-e0813n:321: Katassā jhato yonaṃ nottaṃ hoti. Daṇḍino.
anya-e0813n:322: 87. “Jhalapā rassa”nti ge pare jhalapānaṃ rasso. Hedaṇḍi. Daṇḍī, daṇḍino.
anya-e0813n:324: “Naṃ jhato katarassā”ti aṃiccassa naṃ vā. Daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍiṃ. Daṇḍī, daṇḍino.
anya-e0813n:331: “Lato vo kāro ce”ti lato yonaṃ vottaṃ vā.
anya-e0813n:334: Vevosu akatarasso lo attaṃ yāti. Bhikkhavo, pakkhe – yolopa dīghā. Bhikkhū.
anya-e0813n:336: “Akatarassā lato yvālapanassa vevo”ti ālapane yossa vevokārā, attaṃ. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, bhikkhū.
anya-e0813n:339: “Lato vokāro ce”tīha kāraggahaṇena yonaṃ nottaṃ, cakārena kvaci vononamabhāvova viseso. Jantuno, jantuyo.
anya-e0813n:341: “Satthupitādīnamā sismiṃ silopo ce”ti satthādyantassa ā, silopo ca. Satthā.
anya-e0813n:346: Tato ārato yonaṃ o hoti. Satthāro.
anya-e0813n:349: 99. “Nā ā”ti ārato nāssa ā. Satthārā. Satthārebhi, satthārehi.
anya-e0813n:351: Se satthādyantassa u hoti salopo ca vā. Satthu, satthuno, satthussa.
anya-e0813n:354: 101. “Tato smimī”ti ārato smino i. “Āro rassamīkāre”ti imhi ārassa rasso. Satthari. Satthāresu. Evaṃ nattādi.
anya-e0813n:355: 102. Pitā sattheva. “Pitādīnamasimhī”ti sitoññesu ārassa rassova viseso. Pitaro.
anya-e0813n:357: 103. Abhibhū. Rasse-abhibhuvo. Yolopeabhibhū. Sesaṃ bhikkhūva, rassova viseso.
anya-e0813n:358: 104. Evaṃ sabbaññū. Pubbeva yonaṃ nokāro ca. Sabbaññuno, sabbaññū.
anya-e0813n:361: “Yosu ce”ti gosaddokārassa āvo, “tato yonamo tu”tīha tusaddena yonaṃ o. Gāvo. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:363: Amhi pare gosaddokārassa āvaavā honti, casaddena hinaṃvajjitesu sesesupi.
anya-e0813n:364: 107. “Āvassu vā”ti amhi āvantassa uttaṃ vā, gāhvaṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ. Yo-gāvo. Gāvena, gavena. Gobhi, gohi.
anya-e0813n:365: 108. “Gāva se”ti se ossa āvo. Gāvassa, gavassa. “Tato na”mādo cakārena naṃiccassa aṃ, ossa avo ca. Gavaṃ.
anya-e0813n:366: 109. “Suhināsu ce”tīha cakārena gossa gu ca. Dvitte-gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāvā, gavā, gāvamhā, gavamhā, gāvasmā, gavasmā. Gobhi, gohi.
anya-e0813n:367: 110. Gāve, gave, gāvamhi, gavamhi, gāvasmiṃ, gavasmiṃ. Gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e0813n:371: “Ā gho”ti itthiyaṃ ākārassa ghasaññā. Yo lope – kaññā. Pakkhe – kaññāyo.
anya-e0813n:372: 112. “Ghate ce”ti gassa e. He-kaññe. Kaññā, kaññāyo.
anya-e0813n:378: Ghapehi smino yaṃ vā hoti. Kaññāyaṃ, kaññāya. Kaññāsu.
anya-e0813n:380: “Te itthikhyā po”ti itthiyamivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ pasaññā. Yolopadīghā. Rattī. Pakkhe – rattiyo. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:383: “Pato yā”ti nādekavacanānaṃ yā. Rattiyā. Rattībhi, rattīhi.
anya-e0813n:386: 122. Nadī. Sesaṃ rattīva. Aghattā rassova viseso.
anya-e0813n:392: Itthiyaṃ vattamānā akārantato āpaccayo hoti. Saralopapakalyādi. Kaññā.
anya-e0813n:393: “Dhātuppaccayavibhatti vajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga”nti vacanato paccayantassāliṅgattā taddhitādisutte cakārena nāmamiva kate – syādi. Evaṃ īinīsu.
anya-e0813n:394: Evaṃ ajā, eḷakā, kokilā, assā, mūsikā, balākā, mandā, jarāiccādi.
anya-e0813n:397: Itthiyaṃ nadādito vā anadādito vā ī hoti. Nadī, nagarī, kumārī, brāhmaṇī, taruṇī, kukkuṭī, itthī iccādi.
anya-e0813n:402: 127. “Ṇa va ṇikaṇeyya ṇantūhī”ti ī. Mānavī, nāvikī, venateyyī, gotamī.
anya-e0813n:403: 128. “Ntussa tamīkāre”ti ntussa to vā. Guṇavatī, guṇavantī. Dhitimatī, dhitimantī.
anya-e0813n:406: Patyādīhi īkārantehi ca itthiyaṃ inī hoti.
anya-e0813n:407_0: “Patissinīmhī”ti patyantassa atte saralopādo tukārena lopābhāvo. “Vā paro asarūpā”ti
anya-e0813n:407_1: ilopo, dīgho ca. Gahapatānī, bhikkhunī, rājinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī, dhammacāriṇī,
anya-e0813n:413: Akāranteti napuṃsakehi sissa nicaṃ aṃ hoti. Cittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:416: Akārantehi na puṃsakehi yonaṃ niccaṃ ni hoti, nissa ā. Cittā. Pakkhe – yosvādinā dīghe – cittāni.
anya-e0813n:418: 132. Cittaṃ. Nissa e – citte, cittāni. Sesaṃ buddhova.
anya-e0813n:424: Vibhatyādese sare pare manādito sāgamo vā hoti. Manasā.
anya-e0813n:426: Manādito sassa o hoti, casaddena smāssa ā ca. Manaso, manasā.
anya-e0813n:429: Manaṃ siraṃ uraṃ tejaṃ, rajaṃ ojaṃ vayaṃ payaṃ;
anya-e0813n:430: Yasaṃ tapaṃ vacaṃ cetaṃ, evamādi manogaṇo.
anya-e0813n:432: “Aṃ napuṃsake”ti simhi savibhattissa ntussa aṃ. Guṇavaṃ. Ntussa tte – guṇavantāni.
anya-e0813n:436: “Yonanni napuṃsakehī”ti yonaṃ ni vā. Aṭṭīni. Jhattā yolope – aṭṭhī. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:443: 144. Pumitthiliṅgā – ghaṭa, kaṭa, yaṭṭhi, muṭṭhi, sindhu, reṇuppabhutayo dvipada catuppada jātivācino ca.
anya-e0813n:444: Yathā – ghaṭo, īpaccaye-ghaṭī. Eso yaṭṭhi, esā yaṭṭhiccādi.
anya-e0813n:445: Dvipadajātivācino yathā – khattiyo. Āpaccaye- khattiyā, samaṇo, īmhi-samaṇīiccādi.
anya-e0813n:446: Catuppadajātivācino yathā – gajo, ā-gajā, byaggho, īmhi - byagghīiccādi.
anya-e0813n:448_0: 145. Pumanapuṃsakaliṅgā – dhamma, kamma, brahma, kusuma saṅgama, paduma, assama,
anya-e0813n:448_1: vihāra, sarīra, suvaṇṇa, vaṇṇa, kahāpaṇa, bhavana, bhuvana, yobbana, bhusana, āsana,
anya-e0813n:448_2: sayana, odana, ākāsa, upavāsa, māsa, divasa, rasa, thala, phala, raṭṭha ambu, madhvādayo.
anya-e0813n:452: 147. Sabbaliṅgā – taṭa puṭa patta maṇḍala kalasā dayo, nāmīkatā, sabbanāmāni ca. Yathā – taṭo, īmhi – taṭī, taṭamiccādi.
anya-e0813n:453: Nāmīkatā yathā – devadatto, ā – devadattā devadattamiccādi.
anya-e0813n:455: 148. Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara, dakkhiṇa, uttara, eka, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṃ, tumha, amha-iti sabbanāmāni.
anya-e0813n:459: Sabbādīnamakārato paro paṭhamo yo ettaṃ yāti sabbe.
anya-e0813n:460: “Tayo neva ca sabbanāmehī”ti nisedhā sasmāsminnaṃ āya ā e na honti. Sabbassa.
anya-e0813n:465: Namhi sabbādīnamakārassa e hoti. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:466: 149. Itthiyaṃ ā, sabbā kaññāva. Ayaṃ viseso. Vātveva.
anya-e0813n:468: Ghapasaññāto sabbādito smiṃsānaṃ saṃsā vā honti.
anya-e0813n:471: Ekavacanasaṃsāsu gho rassaṃ yāti. Sabbassā, sabbāya. Sabbāsaṃ, sabbāsānaṃ. Sabbassaṃ, sabbāyaṃ. Sabbāsu.
anya-e0813n:473: Ghapaññāhi sabbādīhi smino āya yā na honti.
anya-e0813n:475: Sabbādayo napuṃsake tatiyādīsu sakasakapumasamā. Evaṃ ya - saddantā.
anya-e0813n:476: 151. Pubbaparāparehi tu smino “yadanupapannā nipātanā sijjhantī”ti anitthiyaṃ e vā. Pubbe, pubbasmiṃiccādi.
anya-e0813n:477: Ekasaddo saṅkhyātulyaññāsahāyattho. Yadā saṅkhyattho, tadekavacano, aññattha sabbavacano ca.
anya-e0813n:482: Simhi anapuṃsakānaṃ etataiccetesaṃ takārassa sa hoti. So.
anya-e0813n:484: Tiliṅgesu sabbādīnaṃ takārassa no vā hoti. Ne, te. Sesaṃ sabbasamaṃ, nattaṃva viseso.
anya-e0813n:485: 153. Itthiyaṃ – sā, nā, nāyo, tā, tāyoiccādi.
anya-e0813n:491: Ekavacanasaṃsāsu tāsaddassa ā ittaṃ vā yāti. Tissāya, tissā, tassā, tāya. Tāsaṃ, tāsānaṃ. Tissaṃ, tassaṃ, tāyaṃ. Tāsu.
anya-e0813n:497: Ekavacanasaṃsāsu etāimānamantassa i hoti. Etissāya, etisā, etāya. Etāsaṃ, etāsānaṃ. Etissaṃ, etassaṃ, etāyaṃ. Etāsu. Sesaṃ sabbāva.
anya-e0813n:500: “Anapuṃsakassāyaṃ simhī”ti imassa ayaṃ. Silopo. Ayaṃ, ime. Imaṃ, ime.
anya-e0813n:501: “Animi nāmhi ce”ti imassa ano, imi ca. Anena, iminā.
anya-e0813n:502: “Sabbassimasse vā”ti sunaṃhisu evā. Ehi, imehi. Vā smāsasmiṃsaṃsāsvattantveva.
anya-e0813n:504: Sasmāsmiṃsaṃsāsu imassa attaṃ vā hoti. Assa, imassa. Esaṃ, esānaṃ, imesaṃ, imesānaṃ. Asmā, imamhā, imasmā. Ehi, imehi. Asmiṃ, imamhi, imasmiṃ. Esu, imesu.
anya-e0813n:505: Attapakkhe – “na timehi katākārehī”ti smāsminnaṃ mhāmhi na sijjhante.
anya-e0813n:506: 159. Itthiyaṃ – ayaṃ. Sesaṃ etāva, saṃsāsvattaṃva viseso.
anya-e0813n:508: “Imassidamaṃsisu napuṃsake”ti imassa idaṃ vā. Idaṃ, imaṃ ime, imāni. Evaṃ dutiyā.
anya-e0813n:511: “Amussa mo saṃ”ti massa so vā, silopo. Asu.
anya-e0813n:512: “Sabbato ko”ti sabbanāmato kāgamo. “So”ti o, amuko, pakkhe – amu. Amū, amuyo.
anya-e0813n:513: Pubbeva yonaṃ vokāro na. Amuṃ. Amū, amuyo. Sesaṃ bhikkhūva sabbādikāriyāññatra.
anya-e0813n:514: 162. Itthiyaṃ – asu. Sesaṃ yāgusamaṃ. Visesoyaṃ – amussā, amuyā. Amūsaṃ, amūsānaṃ. Amussaṃ, amuyaṃ. Amūsu.
anya-e0813n:516: “Amussāduṃ”ti aduṃ. Aduṃ. Amū, amūni. Evaṃ dutiyā.
anya-e0813n:517: 164. “Sesesu ce”ti sabbattha kissa ko. Ko, kā, kaṃ iccādi. Liṅgattaye sabbasamo.
anya-e0813n:521: Simhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhamhānaṃ tvaṃ ahaṃ honti. Casaddena tumhassa tuvaṃ ca. Tvaṃ, tuvaṃ, ahaṃ. Yo – tumhe.
anya-e0813n:522: “Mayaṃ yomhi paṭhame”ti amhassa mayaṃ hoti. Mayaṃ.
anya-e0813n:524: “Tavaṃ mamañca navā”ti amhi tavaṃ mamañca navā.
anya-e0813n:525: “Tumhassa tuvaṃ tvamamhī”ti tumhassa tuvaṃ, tvañca. Taṃ, tavaṃ, tuvaṃ, tvaṃ, maṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:527: “Vā yoppaṭhamo”ti dutiyāyossa ākaṃ vā. Tumhākaṃ, tumhe. Amhākaṃ, amhe.
anya-e0813n:528: 167. “Nāmhi tayā mayā”ti nāmhi tayā mayā honti. “Tayātayīnaṃ takāro tvattaṃvā”ti tassa tvo vā. Tvayā, tayā, mayā. Tumhehi, amhehi.
anya-e0813n:529: 168. “Tava mama se”ti se tava mama honti.
anya-e0813n:532: “Amhassa mamaṃ savibhattissa se”ti se amhassa mamaṃ ca. Tava, tuyhaṃ, tumhaṃ, mama, mayhaṃ, amhaṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:533: “Tumhamhehi namākaṃ”ti naṃvacanassa ākaṃ. Tumhākaṃ, amhākaṃ. Smānāva.
anya-e0813n:534: 169. “Tumhāmhānaṃ tayi mayī”ti smimhi tayi mayi honti. Tve kate - tvayi, tayi, mayi, tumhesu, amhesu. Liṅgattaye samaṃ.
anya-e0813n:537: Atthajjotakā vaṇṇā padaṃ, dutiyā catutthī chaṭṭhī bahuvacanesu paresu padasmā paresaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhāmhānaṃ vonokārā navā honti.
anya-e0813n:538: Rakkhatu vo, passatu no, dadāti vo, dadāhi no, saddhā vo, satthā no.
anya-e0813n:541: “Temekavacanesu ce”ti catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanesu te me honti. Dadāmi te, dadāhi me, idaṃ te, ayaṃ me.
anya-e0813n:542: “Naamhī”ti amhi nisedho. Passetha taṃ, ajini maṃ.
anya-e0813n:543: “Vā tatiye ce”ti tatiyekavacane te me vā honti. Kataṃ te tayā vā. Kataṃ me mayā vā.
anya-e0813n:544: “Bahuvacanesu vono”ti tatiyābahuvacanesu vo no honti. Bahuvacane paṭhame yomhi ca. Kataṃ vo, kataṃ no, gāmaṃ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0813n:550: “Yosu dvinnaṃ dve ce”ti dvissa dve hoti. Dve, dve, dvībhi, dvīhi.
anya-e0813n:552: Namhi dvādito nakārāgamo hoti. Dvinnaṃ, dvīsu, liṅgattaye samaṃ.
anya-e0813n:553: 174. Ticatunnaṃ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0813n:554: Yosu itthipumanapuṃsakesu savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tisso catasso ādayo honti. Tayo, tayo, tībhi, tīhi, tinnaṃ.
anya-e0813n:555: “Iṇṇamiṇṇannaṃ tīhi saṅkhyāhī”ti tisaddato naṃiccassa iṇṇaṃ iṇṇannaṃ ca. Tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0813n:557: “No cā”do cakārena namhi ssaṃāgamo, vaggantetissanaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0813n:560: “Osare ce”tīha cakārena yosu ussa uro. “Tato yonamotū”tīha tukārena yonaṃ o. Caturo. Evaṃ dutiyā. Catūhi, catunnaṃ, catūsu.
anya-e0813n:561: 178. Itthiyaṃ, catasso, catasso, catūhi. Pubbeva ssaṃāgamo. Yadādinā ussa attaṃ. Catassannaṃ, catūsu.
anya-e0813n:563: 180. “Pañcādīna makāro”ti yosu savibhattissa pañcādyantassa attaṃ. Pañca, pañca.
anya-e0813n:564: “Pañcādīna mattaṃ”ti sunaṃhisu pañcādyantassa attaṃ. Edīghānamapavādoyaṃ. Pañcahi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu. Liṅgattaye samaṃ.
anya-e0813n:565: 181. Evaṃ cha satta aṭṭha nava dasādayo aṭṭhārasantā.
anya-e0813n:566: 182. Vīsatyādayo ānavutiyā itthiliṅgā ekavacanantā, vīsati rattīva. Evaṃ tiṃsati.
anya-e0813n:567: Cattālīsaṃ paññāsaṃ saddehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ “sabbāsamā”dotīha ādisaddena lopo, saṭṭhi vīsatī va. Evaṃ sattati asīti navuti.
anya-e0813n:570: 183. Rāsibhede tu sabbattha bahuvacanampi. Yathā-dvevīsatiyo buddhadantā. Tisso vīsatiyo dinaghaṭikā. Evamaññatra.
anya-e0813n:577_1: vibhatyantattā padattaṃ siddhanti na puna vibhatti. Corasmā corato. Evaṃ pitito,
anya-e0813n:577_2: ettha “pitādīna masimhi” tyatrāsimhiggahaṇena tomhi pitādīnaṃ ussa i.
anya-e0813n:579: Thaṃādīsu paresu imassa i hoti. Ito.
anya-e0813n:580: “Sabbassetassākāro vā”ti tothesvetassa attaṃ vā, ato, etto. Pakkhe- “saralopā”dinā akāralopo.
anya-e0813n:582: “Kvaci to”ti suttadvidhākaraṇena sattamyatthe ca to hoti, ādismiṃ, ādito.
anya-e0813n:583_0: 185. “Tratha sattamiyā sabbanāmehī”ti sattamyatthe trathappaccayā honti. Sabbasmiṃ,
anya-e0813n:583_1: sabbatra, sabbattha, dvittaṃ. Evaṃ atra, attha. Ettha “tre nicca”nti pubbe etassa a. Kutra, kuttha.
anya-e0813n:585: 186. “Kismā vo ce”ti vappaccayo. “Kissa ka vece”ti ko, kakārākāralopo. Kva.
anya-e0813n:586: 187. “Hiṃ haṃ hiñcana”nti kasmā hiṃ ādipaccayā. “Ku hiṃ haṃsu ce”ti kissa ku. Cakārena hiñcanaṃ dācanaṃsu ca. Kuhiṃ, kuhaṃ, kuhiñcanaṃ.
anya-e0813n:592: “Kiṃsabbaññekayakuhi dādācana”nti kiṃ ādito dā, dācanaṃ ca. Kasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudācanaṃ.
anya-e0813n:593: “Sabbassa so dāmhi vā”ti sabbassa so vā. Sadā, sabbadā.
anya-e0813n:594: 193. “Tamhā dāni ce”ti dāni, dā ca. Tadāni, tadā.
anya-e0813n:595: 194. Yadādinā imasaddā, samānāparehi ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ jja jjuppaccayā, ima, samānānaṃ a, sā ca. Ajja, sajju, aparajju.
anya-e0813n:596: 195. “Imasmā rahidhunādāni ce”ti rahyādippaccayā. “Eta rahimhī”ti imassa eto. Etarahi.
anya-e0813n:597: “A dhunāmhi ce”ti imassa a. Adhunā, idāni.
anya-e0813n:600: Etehi parā sabbā vibhattī lupyante. Tvaṃ āvuso, tumhe āvuso.
anya-e0813n:603: Pa parā ni nī u du saṃ vi ava anu pari adhi abhi pati su ā ati api apa upa ete vīsatyupasaggā.
anya-e0813n:604_0: Ca na va vā mā hi dhi ci ku tu nu ce re he sve ve vo kho no to yaṃ naṃ taṃ kiṃ handa
anya-e0813n:604_1: kira eva kīva yāva tāva vata vatha atha aṅga iṅgha taggha āma nāma nūna puna pana
anya-e0813n:604_2: āha saha sakkā labbhā heṭṭhā ārā dūrā divā navā vinā nānā addhā mudhā micchā pacchā
anya-e0813n:604_3: āvi sakkhi sacci sacchi bahi yadi iti kinti atthi sotthi khalu nanu kimu assu yagghe
anya-e0813n:604_4: sace have suve are pure namo tiro adho atho aho raho hīyo bhīyo anto pāto sudaṃ kallaṃ
anya-e0813n:604_5: evaṃ dhuvaṃ alaṃ halaṃ sayaṃ sāyaṃ samaṃ sāmaṃ kāmaṃ pāraṃ oraṃ ciraṃ huraṃ ahaṃ
anya-e0813n:604_6: sahaṃ uccaṃ nīcaṃ sakiṃ saddhiṃ, athavā antarā ārakā bāhirā bahiddhā yāvatā tāvatā
anya-e0813n:604_7: samantā sāmantā āmantā sammukhā carahi tarahi sampati āyati upari yāvade tāvade tiriyaṃ
anya-e0813n:604_8: sanikaṃ sasakkaṃ ettāvatā parammukhā kittāvatā etarahi aññadatthu seyyathidaṃ appevanāma
anya-e0813n:605: 198. Sadisā ye tiliṅgesu, sabbāsu ca vibhattīsu.
anya-e0813n:606: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, te nipātāti kittitā.
anya-e0813n:607: Yathā – uccaṃ rukkho, latā, gharaṃ vā, uccaṃ rukkho. He rukkha, rukkhaṃ, rukkhena, rukkhassa, rukkhasmā, rukkhe vā iccādi. Uccaṃ rukkho, rukkhā vā iccādi. Evaṃ latā, gharāni.
anya-e0813n:613_0: Taṃ yathā – adhiantosaddehi sattamī. Sayaṃsaddā tatiyā, chaṭṭhī ca. Namosaddā paṭhamā,
anya-e0813n:613_1: dutiyā ca. Pāraṃsaddā sattamī. Divāsaddā paṭhamā, dutiyā, sattamī ca. Heṭṭhāsaddā
anya-e0813n:613_2: sattamī. Uccaṃsaddā sabbāpi. Pasaddā ca casaddā ca paṭhamā, hesaddā ālapane paṭhamā. Tathāññehipi.
anya-e0813n:614: 200. Upasaggā sabbepi saddantarena saha payujjante. Nipātā tu keci visumpi. Yathā – pahāro, paharati, sā ca so ca bhāsati vā karoti vā, sotthityādi.
anya-e0813n:620: 202. Nāmānaṃ samāso yuttatthotyadhikāro. Samāsoti bhinnatthānaṃ padāna mekatthatā. Yuttatthoti aññamaññasambandhattho.
anya-e0813n:625: Bhinnappavattinimittā saddā ekasmiṃ vatthuni pavattā tulyādhikaraṇā, visesanavisesassabhūtā samānādhikaraṇā dve padā yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso kammadhārayo
anya-e0813n:626: Nāma, idha vā samāsasuttāni saññādvārena samāsavidhāyakāni.
anya-e0813n:627_0: Aggahitavisesanā buddhi visessamhi na uppajjatīti visesanaṃ pubbaṃ hoti, samāseneva
anya-e0813n:627_1: tulyādhikaraṇattassa vuttattā tappakāsanatthaṃ payuttā samāsato atirittā ca so iccete
anya-e0813n:629: Tesaṃ yuttatthānaṃ samāsānaṃ pubbuttarapadānaṃ vibhattī lupyante, cakārena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n:630: Tato mahanta vīra iti ca rūpappasaṅge –
anya-e0813n:632: Vibhattīsu luttāsu sarantassa pubbabhūtassa, parabhūtassa ca assa samāsapadassa pakati hotītīha luttākārā punānīyante.
anya-e0813n:636: Taddhitādayo nāmaṃ iva daṭṭhabbā taveppabhutipaccaye vajjetvā.
anya-e0813n:638: 204. Kammadhārayo dvando ca, tappuriso ca lābhino.
anya-e0813n:640: 205. Rattā ca sā paṭī cāti rattapaṭī, mahantī ca sā saddhā cāti mahāsaddhā. Ettha “kammadhārayasaññe ce”ti pubbapade pumeva kate āīpaccayānaṃ nivutti.
anya-e0813n:641: 206. Nīlañca taṃ uppalañcāti nīluppalaṃ, satthīva satthi, satthi ca sā sāmā cāti satthisāmā. Mukhameva cando mukhacando.
anya-e0813n:642: Visesanavisessānaṃ yathecchattā kvaci visesanaṃ paraṃ hoti, khattiyabhūtoiccādi, icchā ca yathātanti.
anya-e0813n:644: 207. Nasaddā si, tassa lopo. Na suro asuro.
anya-e0813n:645: Ettha kammadhāraye kate – “ubhe tappurisā”ti tappurisasaññā. “Attannassa tappurise”ti nassa a. Na asso anasso. Ettha “sare ana”ti nassa ana.
anya-e0813n:646_0: 208. “Nāmānaṃ samāso”ti sutte dvidhākate ayuttatthānampi kvaci samāso. Na puna geyyā
anya-e0813n:646_1: apunageyyā gāthetyādi. Ettha geyyena sambandho na-saddo ayuttatthenāpi punena yogavibhāgabalā samasyate.
anya-e0813n:649: Ettha “saṅkhyāpubbo digū”ti kammadhārayassa digusaññā. ‘Digussekattaṃ”ti ekattaṃ, napuṃsakattañca.
anya-e0813n:653: Dutiyantādayo parapadehi nāmehi yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso tappuriso nāma.
anya-e0813n:655: “Passa vāsiṭṭha gāmaṃ, gato tisso sāvatthiṃ”tya trāyuttatthatāya na samāso. Tathā ññatra ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0813n:658_0: Tabba, anīya, ṇya, teyya, riccappaccayā kiccā. Thutinindatthamajjhāropitatthaṃ vacanaṃ
anya-e0813n:658_1: adhikatthavacanaṃ. Soṇaleyyo kūpoiccādi. Soṇehi yathā liyhate, tathā puṇṇattā thuti.
anya-e0813n:659: Dadhinā upasittaṃ bhojanaṃ dadhibhojanaṃ, samāsapadeneva upasittakriyāya kathanā natthetthāyuttatthatā. Upasittasaddāppayogo pubbeva.
anya-e0813n:661: 213. Buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhaddeyyaṃ, parassapadaṃ, ettha vibhatyalopo. Evaṃ attanopadamiccādi.
anya-e0813n:664_0: “Brāhmaṇassa kaṇhā dantā” iccatra dantāpekkhā chaṭṭhīti kaṇhena sambandhābhāvā na
anya-e0813n:664_1: samāso. Yadā tu kaṇhā ca te dantā ceti kammadhārayo, tadā chaṭṭhī kaṇhadantāpekkhāti
anya-e0813n:665_0: 216. “Rañño māgadhassa dhana” ntyatra raññoti chaṭṭhī dhana mapekkhate, na māgadhaṃ.
anya-e0813n:665_1: Rājā eva māgadhasaddena vuccateti bhedābhāvā sambandhābhāvoti tulyādhikaraṇena māgadhena
anya-e0813n:665_2: saha rājā na samasyate. Dviṭṭho hi sambandho.
anya-e0813n:666_0: Rañño asso puriso ce” tya tra rañño asso, rañño puriso ti ca paccekaṃ sambandhato
anya-e0813n:666_1: sāpekkhatā atthīti na samāso. “Asso ca puriso cā”ti dvande kate tu rājassapurisāti
anya-e0813n:668: Puttena saha samāso, gamakattā. Gamakattampi samāsassa nibandhanaṃ. Tattha garuno puttoti viggaho, evamaññatra.
anya-e0813n:670: Kvaci nindāyaṃ - kūpe maṇḍūko viya kūpamaṇḍūko. Evaṃ nagarakāko iccādi. Atropamāya nindā gamyate.
anya-e0813n:674: Appaṭhamantāna maññesaṃ padānaṃ atthesu dve vā bahūni vā nāmāni yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso bahubbīhi nāma.
anya-e0813n:675: Āgatā samaṇā yaṃ sā āgatasamaṇo, vihāro.
anya-e0813n:676: 219. Jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo, bhagavā. Āhito aggi yena so āhitaggi. Agyāhito vātyādo yathecchaṃ visesanassa paratā.
anya-e0813n:677: 220. Karaṇe tu-chinno rukkho yena so chinnarukkho, pharasu.
anya-e0813n:678: 221. Dinno suṅko yassa so dinnasuṅko, rājā.
anya-e0813n:679: 222. Niggatā janā yasmā so niggatajano, gāmo.
anya-e0813n:680: 223. Dasa balāni yassa so dasabalo, bhagavā. Natthi samo yassa so asamo. Ettha “attannassā”ti yogavibhāgena nassa a.
anya-e0813n:681: Pahūtā jivhā yassa so pahūtajivho, mahantī paññā yassa so mahāpañño. Dvīsu “itthiyambhāsitapumitthīpumāva ce”ti pumbhāvātidesā pubbuttarapadesu āīppaccayānamabhāvo.
anya-e0813n:682_0: 224. “Kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti antassa attaṃ. Kāraggahaṇena ā i ca. Itthiyamivaṇṇantā,
anya-e0813n:682_1: tvantehi ca kappaccayopi. Yathā - visālaṃ akkhi yassa so visālakkho, paccakkhadhammā,
anya-e0813n:682_2: silopo. Sobhano gandho yassa so sugandhi. Bahukantiko, bahunadiko, samuddo. Ettha
anya-e0813n:682_3: yadādinā rasso. Bahukattuko. Mattā bahavo mātaṅgā yasmiṃ taṃ mattabahumātaṅgaṃ, vanaṃ.
anya-e0813n:684: 225. Suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. Vajiraṃ pāṇimhi yassa so vajirapāṇi. Urasi lomāni yassa so urasilomo. Ettha vibhatyalopo.
anya-e0813n:685: “Atthesū”ti bahuttaggahaṇena kvaci paṭhamantānampi. Saha hetunā yo vattate so sahetuko, “yadā” dinā sahassa so.
anya-e0813n:686: 226. Satta vā aṭṭha vā sattaṭṭha, māsā, etthaññapadattho vā saddassattho. Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca disāya yaṃ antarālaṃ, sā dakkhiṇapubbā, disā.
anya-e0813n:688: Appaṭhamantānanti kiṃ, desito buddhena yo dhammo.
anya-e0813n:691: Samuccayo, ti piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ ekavibhattikānaṃ nāmānaṃ yo samuccayo, so dvando nāma, idaṃ suttaṃ bahuvacanavisayaṃ.
anya-e0813n:692: Cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā. Tiṭṭhanti tyādi-
anya-e0813n:694: 228. Tathā dvande pāṇi turiya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0813n:695: Vividhenākārena viruddhā vividhaviruddhā, sabhāgā sadisā, vividhā ca te sabhāgā ceti visabhāgā. Yathā digusamāse, tathā dvande pāṇyaṅgatthādīnaṃ ekattaṃ, napuṃsakattañca hoti.
anya-e0813n:696: Cakkhusotaṃ, gītavāditaṃ, yuganaṅgalaṃ, hatthassaṃ, asicammaṃ, ḍaṃsamakasaṃ, kokālūkaṃ.
anya-e0813n:697: Nāmarūpaṃ, nāmaṃ namanalakkhaṇaṃ, rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Evamete dhammā lakkhaṇato vividhā, paramatthato sabhāgā ca.
anya-e0813n:698: Ādisaddenāññatthāpi. Yathā - bhinnaliṅgānaṃ - itthipumaṃ. Yadādinā rasso, dāsidāsaṃ, pattacīvaraṃ. Gaṅgāsoṇaṃ.
anya-e0813n:704: 229. Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0813n:705: Dvande rukkhādīnaṃ ekattaṃ napuṃsakattañca vā hoti.
anya-e0813n:706: Dhavakhadiraṃ, dhavakhadirā, muñjapabbajaṃ, muñjapabbajā, ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā, hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇāni, sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā.
anya-e0813n:708: Ādisaddena aññesupi vā. Yathā – niccavirodhīnamaddabbānaṃ - kusalākusalaṃ, kusalākusalāni.
anya-e0813n:713: 230. Adhisaddā smiṃ, tassa lopo. Adhisaddena tulyādhikaraṇattā itthisaddāpismiṃ. Niccasamāsattā ādhārabhūtāyamitthiyanti padantarena viggaho. Adhi itthiyanti ṭhite –
anya-e0813n:715: Upasaggādipubbako saddo vibhatyatthādīsu samāso hoti, abyayībhāvasañño ca.
anya-e0813n:716: “So napuṃsakaliṅgo”ti abyayībhāvo napuṃsakaliṅgo, yadādinā ekavacano ca.
anya-e0813n:719: Anakārantā abyayībhāvā parā sabbā vibhattī lujjare. Adhitthi, vibhattīnamattho ādhārādi.
anya-e0813n:720: Idhādhisaddo ādhārevattate, adhitthiiccetaṃ padaṃ itthiya miccetamatthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0813n:721: Samīpaṃ nagarassa upanagaraṃ. “Aṃvibhattīnamakārantabyayībhāvā”ti vibhattīnaṃ kvaci aṃ.
anya-e0813n:723: Abhāvo makkhikānaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ rasso. Anupubbo therānaṃ anutheraṃ, anatikkamma sattiṃ yathāsatti.
anya-e0813n:726: Ā pabbatā khettaṃ āpabbataṃ khettaṃ, mariyādāyaṃ, vajjamānā sīmā mariyādā, pabbataṃ vinātyattho.
anya-e0813n:727: Ā jalantā sītaṃ ājalantaṃ sītaṃ, abhividhimhi, gayhamānā sīmā abhividhi, jalantena sahetyattho.
anya-e0813n:729_1: kammadhārayoeva. Evaṃ visiṭṭho dhammo abhidhammo. Kucchitaṃ annaṃ kadannaṃ. Etttha
anya-e0813n:730: Appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ, ettha “kāppatthesu cā”ti kussa kā, bahuvacanenāññatrāpi kvaci. Kucchito puriso kāpuriso, kupuriso vā, evamasurādi.
anya-e0813n:732: Kammadhārayaka tappurisā dve, dvendo ca bahubbīhi ca ñeyyā.
anya-e0813n:737: Chaṭṭhantā saddā “tassāpacca”miccasmiṃ atthe ṇo vā hoti. Vāti vākyatthaṃ. Ṇenevāpaccatthassa vuttattā apaccasaddāppayogo.
anya-e0813n:740: “Vuddhādisarassa vā saṃyogantassa saṇe ce”ti saṇakāre pare asaṃyogantassādisarassa vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:743: Akārivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ āeovuddhiyo honti, casaddena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n:748: Vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ poso vāsiṭṭho, itthī vāsiṭṭhī, napuṃsakaṃ vāsiṭṭhaṃ. Vikappavidhānato taddhitena samāsassāccantaṃ bādhāyā bhāvā vasiṭṭhā paccantipi hoti.
anya-e0813n:752: Vacchādito gottagaṇato ṇāyano ṇāno ca vā hoti.
anya-e0813n:753: Apaccaṃ paputtappabhuti gottaṃ. Kaccassāpaccaṃ kaccāyano, kaccāno vā. Saṃyogantattā na vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:754_0: 234. “Ṇeyyo kattikādīhī”ti ṇeyyo, vinatāya apaccaṃ venateyyo vinateyyo vā. Na pakkhe
anya-e0813n:754_1: vuddhi, ṇeyyoti yogavibhāgena “tassa dīyate” tyatthepi ṇeyyo, dakkhiṇā dīyate yassa so dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0813n:756: Akārantato apacce ṇi vā hoti, puna vāsaddena ṇiko, akārantā anakārantā ca bopi.
anya-e0813n:758: 236. “Ṇavo pagvādīhī” ti ṇavo. Manuno apaccaṃ māṇavo.
anya-e0813n:761_0: 238. “Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko”ti ṇiko. Vākārena nekatthenekapaccayā
anya-e0813n:761_1: ca. Ghatena saṃsaṭṭho ghātiko, odano. Uḷūpena taratīti oḷūpiko, uḷūpiko vā, na pakkhe vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:762: Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Sīsena vahatīti sīsiko, na vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:763_0: Itthiliṅgato eyyako, ṇako ca. Campāyaṃ jāto campeyyako. Evaṃ bārāṇaseyyako. Ṇako
anya-e0813n:763_1: – kusinārāyaṃ vasatīti kosinārako. Janapadato ṇako ca – magadhesu vasati, tesaṃ issaro vā māgadhako.
anya-e0813n:764: Tajjātiyā visiṭṭhatthe ājānīyo. Assajātiyā visiṭṭho assājānīyo. Ño - agganti jānitabbaṃ aggaññaṃ, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:766_0: Taṃ adhīte iccādīsvatthesu ādisaddena hatādīsu ca ṇiko vā hoti. Abhidhammamadhīteti
anya-e0813n:766_1: ābhidhammiko, abhidhammiko vā, na pakkhe vuddhi. Vacasā kataṃ kammaṃ vācasikaṃ. Evaṃ mānasikaṃ, ettha –
anya-e0813n:768: Sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā. Dvāre niyutto dovāriko, ettha- “māyūnamāgamo ṭhāne”ti vakārato pubbe okārāgamo.
anya-e0813n:769_0: Sippanti gītādikalā, vīṇā assa sippanti veṇiko, atra vīṇeti vīṇāvādanaṃ. Gandho assa
anya-e0813n:769_1: bhaṇḍanti gandhiko, mage hantvā jīvatīti māgaviko, vakārāgamo. Jālena hato jāliko,
anya-e0813n:769_2: suttena baddho suttiko, cāpo assa āyudhanti cāpiko, vāto assa ābādho atthīti vā vātiko,
anya-e0813n:769_3: buddhe pasanno buddhiko, vatthena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vatthikaṃ.
anya-e0813n:770: Kumbho assa parimāṇaṃ, ta marahati, tesaṃ rāsi vā kumbhiko. Akkhena dibbatīti akkhiko, magadhesu vasati, jātoti vā māgadhiko iccādi.
anya-e0813n:771: 240. Ṇa rāgā tena rattaṃ tassedamaññatthesu ca.
anya-e0813n:772: Tena rattaṃ tyādyatthesu ṇo vā hoti. Kasāvena rattaṃ kāsāvaṃ.
anya-e0813n:773: Evaṃ nīlaṃ pītamiccādi. Na vuddhi, mahisassa idaṃ māhisaṃ, siṅgaṃ.
anya-e0813n:774_0: Evaṃ rājaporisaṃ, ettha “ayuvaṇṇānañcā” do puna vuddhiggahaṇena uttarapadassa vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:774_1: Magadhehi āgato, tatra jāto, tesaṃ issaro, te assa nivāsoti vā māgadho, kattikādīhi
anya-e0813n:775: Buddho assa devatāti buddho. Byākaraṇaṃ avecca adhīteti veyyākaraṇo. Ettha “māyūnamā”dinā yakārato pubbe e āgamo, yassa dvittaṃ. Sagarehi nibbatto sāgaroiccādi.
anya-e0813n:777: Jātādīsu imo iyo ca hoti, casaddena kiyo ca. Pacchā jāto pacchimo, manussajātiyā jāto manussajātiyo. Ante niyutto antimo, antiyo.
anya-e0813n:778: Evaṃ andhakiyo. Putto assa atthīti puttimo, puttiyo. Evaṃ kappiyo.
anya-e0813n:779: 242. “Tadassaṭṭhānamīyo ce”ti īyo, cakārena hitādyatthepi, bandhanassa ṭhānaṃ bandhanīyaṃ, caṅkamanassa hitaṃ caṅkamanīyaṃ.
anya-e0813n:784: Ayametesaṃ atisayena pāpoti pāpataro, pāpatamo, pāpissiko, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho vā.
anya-e0813n:785: “Vuddhassa jo iyiṭṭhesū”ti vuddhassa jādese – “saralopā”do pakatiggahaṇena pakatyabhāvā issa e. Jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0813n:786: Evaṃ “pasatthassa so ce”ti sādese seyyo, seṭṭho.
anya-e0813n:788: 245. “Tadassatthīti vī ce”ti vī. Medhā assa atthīti medhāvī.
anya-e0813n:790: 247. “Daṇḍādito ika ī”ti iko, ī ca. Daṇḍiko, daṇḍī.
anya-e0813n:791: 248. “Guṇādito vantū”ti vantu. Guṇavā, paññavā. Yadādinā rasso.
anya-e0813n:795: 252. “Tappakativacane mayo”ti mayo. Suvaṇṇena pakataṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ, suvaṇṇamayaṃ vā. Pakkhe - yadādinā vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:800: “Dvitīhi tiyo”ti tiyo, “tiye dutāpi ce”ti dvitīnaṃ dutā. Dvinnaṃ pūraṇo dutiyo, evaṃ tatiyo.
anya-e0813n:803: Catuttha dutiya tatiyānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadena saha aḍḍhuḍḍha divaḍḍha diyaḍḍhāḍḍhatiyā honti.
anya-e0813n:804: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, diyaḍḍho vā, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0813n:805: 256. “Saṅkhyāpūraṇe mo”ti mo, pañcamo. Itthiyaṃ pañcannaṃ pūraṇī pañcamī.
anya-e0813n:806: Eko ca dasa cāti dvande kate –
anya-e0813n:808: Saṅkhyāne uttarapade dviekaaṭṭhaiccetesa mantassa ā vā hoti. Ekādasa pañcīva. Evaṃ dvādasa.
anya-e0813n:809: Yadādinā tissa teādese “ekādito dassa ra saṅkhyāne”ti dasasadde dassa ro. Terasa.
anya-e0813n:810: 257. “Catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādicassa cucopi navā”ti catusadde tussa lopo cassa cu ca. Cuddasa.
anya-e0813n:811: “Dase so niccañce”ti chassa soādese – “ḷa darānaṃ”ti dasasadde dassa ḷo. Soḷasa, aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0813n:812: 258. “Vīsati dasesu bā dvissa tū”ti dvissa bā. Bāvīsati, ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo ekādasamo.
anya-e0813n:814: “Dvādito konekatthe ce”ti ko, dve parimāṇāni asseti dvikaṃ. Evaṃ tikādi.
anya-e0813n:815: 260. “Samūhatthe kaṇṇā”ti kaṇa ca, ṇo ca. Manussānaṃ samūho mānussako, mānusso vā.
anya-e0813n:816: Ṇe kate – “jhalānamiyuvā sare vā” tīha vākārena issa ayādese – dvayaṃ, tayaṃ. Evaṃ “gāmajanabandhusahāyādīhi tā”ti tā. Gāmatā, nāgaratā.
anya-e0813n:819: Bhāvatthe ṇyattatā honti. Tusaddena ttano ca. Sakatthādīsupi ṇyo, sakatthe tā ca.
anya-e0813n:825_0: 263. Yathā – candassa bhāvo candattaṃ. Iha nāmavasā candasaddo candaddabbe vattate,
anya-e0813n:825_1: nimittassa rūpānugatañca ñāṇaṃ. Evaṃ manussattanti manussajātivasā. Yadādinā īssa
anya-e0813n:825_2: rasse – daṇḍittanti daṇḍaddabbasambandhā. Pācakattanti pacanakriyāsambandhā. Nīlattanti nīlaguṇavasā.
anya-e0813n:828: Ye pare avaṇṇo lupyate, cakārena ikāropi.
anya-e0813n:829_0: Yavataṃ talaṇadakārānaṃ byañjanāni calaña jakāratta”nti yakārayuttānaṃ tādīnaṃ cādayo,
anya-e0813n:829_1: kāraggahaṇena sakapabhamādito parayakārassa pubbena saha kvaci pubbarūpañca, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:829_2: Paṇḍiccaṃ, kosallaṃ, sāmaññaṃ, sohajjaṃ, porissaṃ, nepakkaṃ, sāruppaṃ, osabbhaṃ, opammaṃ.
anya-e0813n:831: Iuiccetesaṃ ā hoti, rikārāgamo ca ṭhāne.
anya-e0813n:833: Ārissaṃ. Evaṃ mudutā, arahatā, ntassa yadādinā lopo.
anya-e0813n:834: Puthujjanattanaṃ, akiñcanameva ākiñcaññaṃ, kuṇḍaniyā apaccaṃ koṇḍañño, ettha vuddhādo vākārena saṃyogantassāpi vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:835: Padāya hitaṃ pajjaṃ, dhanāyaṃ saṃvattanikaṃ dhaññaṃ, satito sambhūtaṃ saccaṃ, ilopo, tīsu na vuddhi. Devo eva devatā.
anya-e0813n:836: 264. “Ṇa visamādīhī”ti bhāve ṇo. Vesamaṃ. Ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ. Ettha ussa ātte parūkārassa yadādinā avo.
anya-e0813n:839: 266. “Vibhāge dhā ce”ti dhā, cakārena soppaccayo ca. Ekena vibhāgena ekadhā, nipātattā silopo. Padavibhāgena padaso.
anya-e0813n:840: 267. “Sabbanāmehi pakāravacane tu thā”ti thā. Tukārena thattā ca. Sabbo pakāro, sabbena pakārena vā sabbathā. Evaṃ aññathattā.
anya-e0813n:841: 268. “Kimimehi tha”nti thaṃ, kādese-kathaṃ. Iādese-itthaṃ, thanti yogavibhāgena thaṃ-bahutthaṃ.
anya-e0813n:842_0: 269. Amalinaṃ malinaṃ karotītyādyatthe-abhūtatabbhāve gamyamāne karabhūyoge sati
anya-e0813n:842_1: nāmato yadādinā īppaccayo, malinīkaroti setaṃ. Abhasmano bhasmano karaṇanti bhasmīkaraṇaṃ
anya-e0813n:842_2: kaṭṭhassa. Amalino malino bhavatīti malinībhavati seto. Īppaccayantopi nipāto. Abhūtatabbhāveti
